markdown:
![](https://www.tiaa.org/content/dam/tiaa/public/images/dummy-img.png)

Retirement plans

# Your road to retirement begins here

Enrolling in your employer’s retirement plan is a great first step toward securing your future. It only takes a few minutes, and the benefits can last a lifetime.

# Find your employer to get started

You can then select a retirement plan and select enroll to get started.

Hit enter to search

Search for your employer

Already enrolled and need to register for online access? [RegisterOpens in a new window](https://auth.tiaa.org/public/authentication/enroll#/email)

If you’re self-employed or your employer doesn’t offer TIAA, consider an [IRA](https://www.tiaa.org/public/retire/financial-products/iras) or personal [annuity](https://www.tiaa.org/public/retire/financial-products/annuities/personal-annuities) to ensure you are saving for your future.

# Over a century of serving those who do good in the world

For more than 100 years, TIAA has helped professionals in academic, government, medical and other non-profit fields find confidence in retirement. See how you can build a more secure financial future with our variety of investment and insurance options including plans with lifetime income. 1

![](https://www.tiaa.org/content/dam/tiaa/public/images/dummy-img.png)

### Know where you stand today

We can help you determine whether you’re on track for the retirement you envision.

![](https://www.tiaa.org/content/dam/tiaa/public/images/dummy-img.png)

### Create a personalized plan

We take the time to understand your values and goals, then help you create a plan to move towards retirement.

![](https://www.tiaa.org/content/dam/tiaa/public/images/dummy-img.png)

### Meet your goals

With low fees and many services at no additional cost, you can take your retirement savings to the next level.

### Know where you stand today

We can help you determine whether you’re on track for the retirement you envision.

### Create a personalized plan

We take the time to understand your values and goals, then help you create a plan to move towards retirement.

### Meet your goals

With low fees and many services at no additional cost, you can take your retirement savings to the next level.

## Get trusted help with your enrollment or investing questions

Call [800-842-2252Call 800-842-2252](tel:800-842-2252) to schedule an appointment to get more information. We’re here weekdays from 8 A.M. – 10 P.M. (ET).

1 Any guarantees under annuities issued by TIAA are subject to TIAA's claims-paying ability.

G-3134837P-E0924W

metadata.description: Search for your employer name to locate the information you need to enroll in your employer-sponsored retirement plan.
